mapper.insert: INSERT INTO os_wishlist( id, product_id, customer_id, designer_id, type, del_flag, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{product.id}, #{customer.id}, #{designer.id}, #{type}, #{delFlag}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE os_wishlist SET product_id = #{product.id}, customer_id = #{customer.id}, designer_id = #{designer.id}, type = #{type}, update_date = #{updateDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id} WHERE id = #{id}
